means: [人名] [苏格兰人、北爱尔兰人姓氏] 奥格尔住所名称，来源于古英语人名Ocga+“山”(hill)

sentence.Network_en: What to do? Just to watch and ogle them from the other side of the ditch.
sentence.Network_cn: 去干 什么 ?只是为了可以在壕沟的这边眺望她们,向她们眉目传情.

sentence.Network_en: Do ogle her. Just remember to use discretion and show proper respect.
sentence.Network_cn: 记住你的目光中应透露出你慎重和尊敬——不行就装一下嘛.

sentence.Network_en: Ogle with little horse in Seven Star Park.
sentence.Network_cn: 与七星公园的马儿“眉目传情”.

list.abs: women hate men for ogling other women ( or ogling breasts ) . this is especially annoying when they are on a date together .女人讨厌男人偷看别的女人或瞄人家的胸部，尤其是在一起约会时。

women hate men for ogling other women ( or ogling breasts ) .女人厌恶男人向其它女人抛媚眼(或注视别人胸部)。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: probably from Low German or Dutch; compare with Low German oegeln, frequentative of oegen 'look at'

entry.def: If you say that one person is ogling another, you disapprove of them continually staring at that person in a way that indicates a strong sexual interest.

example.ex: All she did was hang around ogling the men in the factory...
example.tran: 她所做的就只是在工厂里荡来荡去，朝男人抛媚眼。

example.ex: Paula is not used to everyone ogling at her while she undresses backstage.
example.tran: 葆拉还不习惯在后台换衣服时所有人都色迷迷地盯着她看。

auth_sentence.content: Ogle some of the Caribbean's most extravagant yachts over a drink and snack.

auth_sentence.content: With top totty like Cathy Mac to ogle, it's always worth tuning in.

auth_sentence.content: Some spectators came to ogle her through a telescope she had set up near a back wall, others to keep a reverent vigil.

Sentence.sentence: Its co-founder Matt Ogle explains its raison d'être (存在的理由) like this: "In an age of endless choice, we were missing a way to say: 'This.

sentences.en: Uncle Geooge got a black eye for ogling a lady in the pub.
sentences.cn: 乔治叔叔在酒店里对一女士抛媚眼而被打黑了一只眼睛。

sentences.en: He ogled at all the attractive girls in the office.
sentences.cn: 他向办公室里所有有魅力的女孩暗送秋波。

sentences.en: He’ll get a bad name for himself if he ogles at every girl he meets.
sentences.cn: 他要是对他碰见的每个姑娘都使媚眼，就会名声扫地。
